history.proof: intros m n H1 H2 H3. intro H4. apply (Zrel_prime_neq_mod_0 m n). - hauto lq: on use: Z.divide_refl, not_rel_prime2. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: not_rel_prime2. - hauto lq: on use: Z.divide_refl, not_rel_prime2.

ctx: intros m n H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x y d : Z, (d | x) -> (d | y) -> d <> 1 -> d <> -1 -> ~ rel_prime x y" on hypothesis of type "m = n".

ctx: intros m n H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: In environment m, n : Z H1 : m <> 1 H2 : m <> -1 H3 : rel_prime m n H4 : m = n Unable to unify "m = n" with "False".

original: intros m n H1 H2 H3. intro H4. apply not_rel_prime2 with (d := 1) in H4. - apply H4; auto. - auto. - auto. - apply (Zrel_prime_neq_mod_0 m n). auto. auto.
